requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

CPU: Pentium 4 or Athlon XP equivalent

CPU SPEED: 1.3 GHz with a T and L capable Video Card (2.4 GHz without Hardware T and L Video Card)

RAM: 256 MB or 512MB RAM is required if 3 or more expansions are installed

OS: Windows 98 / ME / 2000 / XP / Vista / 7

VIDEO CARD: 32 MB 3D accelerated video card (NVIDIA GeForce2 GTS+/ ATI Radeon 8500+)

TOTAL VIDEO RAM: 32 MB

3D: Yes

HARDWARE T&L: No

DIRECTX VERSION: 9.0c (included)

SOUND CARD: Yes

FREE DISK SPACE: 3.5 GB

DVD-ROM: 8x DVD-ROM. This game contains technology intended to prevent copying that may conflict with some DVD-ROM, DVD-RW and virtual drives.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

CPU: Pentium 4 or Athlon XP equivalent

CPU SPEED: 2.4 GHz

RAM: 512 MB

OS: Windows XP/Vista/7

VIDEO CARD: 128 MB 3D accelerated video card (NVIDIA GeForce 6600+/ ATI Radeon 9700+)

TOTAL VIDEO RAM: 128 MB

3D: Yes

HARDWARE T&L: Yes

PIXEL SHADER: 2.0

VERTEX SHADER: 2.0

DIRECTX VERSION: 9.0c (included)

SOUND CARD: Yes

FREE DISK SPACE: 3.5 GB

DVD-ROM: 8x DVD-ROM. This game contains technology intended to prevent copying that may conflict with some DVD-ROM, DVD-RW and virtual drives.

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better

  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Processor: 2 GHz

  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0)

  • Graphics: 64 MB ATI Radeon/NVIDIA GEForce 4

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Intel Based Processor (w/ SSE2 Instruction Set Support)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Graphics Card, 1024x768 Minimum Screen Resolution, DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: We've noticed some issues on Retina-based macs while using Steam's overlays - please turn off Steam overlays if you can't see the intro video but can hear it!
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Based Processor (w/ SSE2 Instruction Set Support)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Graphics Card, 1024x768 Minimum Screen Resolution, DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: We've noticed some issues on Retina-based macs while using Steam's overlays - please turn off Steam overlays if you can't see the intro video but can hear it!

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 (See Notes)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Processor (w/ SSE2 Instruction Set Support)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Graphics Card, 1024x768 Minimum Screen Resolution, DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Note: The Linux version has had limited testing on Ubuntu 14.04. Other distros may work but cannot be officially supported.
